archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0705
archimate:Requirement.documentation: I want to be able to recycle my device.

properties.value: What is the impact on BUY journey, additional discount for returned device? No. Another process is trade-in in which a device has some value and the customer is compensated by a voucher etc. If needed a separate requirement would be registered.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
